https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2L9c6Wwo3hvlZgKcywYbX7Svi6O.jpg A collection of 3 short films. LOVE FOR SALE (dir. Jang Joon-hwan): A man searching for his missing ex-girlfriend uncovers the dark secret behind an organization selling romantic virtual reality experiences. KAMOME (dir. Isao Yukisada): A film director looking for artistic inspiration runs into a strange woman who may or may not be a ghost. IRON PUSSY (dir. Wisit Sasanatieng): An assassin and a target for in love with each other but the assassin must complete the assignment. Camellia
